org.jetel.ctl.extensions

Class TLNumericFormatLocaleCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.extensions.TLCache
      • org.jetel.ctl.extensions.TLFormatterCache
        • org.jetel.ctl.extensions.TLNumericFormatLocaleCache

  • public class TLNumericFormatLocaleCache
extends TLFormatterCache

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jetel.ctl.extensions.TLFormatterCache

        previousLocaleString, previousTimeZoneString

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TLNumericFormatLocaleCache(TLFunctionCallContext context) 
      TLNumericFormatLocaleCache(TLFunctionCallContext context, boolean isDecimal)
      This cache can work in two modes. 1) For isDecimal equal false 'NumericFormatterFactory.createFormatter()' is used to create formatter. 2) For isDecimal equal true 'NumericFormatterFactory.createDecimalFormatter()' is used to create formatter.

      • getLocale

        protected java.util.Locale getLocale(java.lang.String localeString)
        Description copied from class: TLFormatterCache
        Returns a Locale instance for the given locale ID. If the input string is null or empty, returns default Locale from the context.

        Examples:
        en en.GB fr fr.FR cs cs.CZ

        Caches the last instance. A call to this method updates TLFormatterCache.previousLocaleString as a side effect.
        Overrides:
        getLocale in class TLFormatterCache
        Parameters:
        localeString - locale ID
        Returns:
        cached Locale
